arabic.title: ما خلاص
text: ما خلاص .. اللي راح .. مني راح
شفت أنا .. كام سنة .. غيروني ازاي ؟
و بناقص كل همي .. ولا واقفة عليك حياة
م الليلادي ب أعلى صوتي بقولها لا
أنا عشت عمري سنين عادية في هواك ماليش دية
لو حاجة حلوة انا عشتها عرفني ايه هي
حبيتك .. واديت من عمري .. وبقول دلوقتي
ولقيتك .. بتاخدني لدنيا .. انا فيها لوحدي ..

english.title: Isn't it over?
text: isn't it over?.. what's gone,, is gone
but for my own sake, I will live for tomorrow
have you seen.. how a few years.. have changed me?
and to hell with all my weary.. life is not just about you
from this night on, I will scream out 'NO!'
I lived worthless in ordinary years in your love
don't make me sick and tired from being alone
if there was any good thing that I've lived, tell me what it was
I loved you.. and gave from my life.. and now I'm saying
and found you.. taking me to a world.. where I was all alone
I don't understand.. what's happened to you
why have you changed.. where's the love of the old days
you must listen to me.. and answer as well

arabic.title: أصل الإحساس
text: لا كان على بالي أنا اسهر ليالي وأدوب بانشغالي وأنا قلبي معاك
مفيش في خيالي غير اللي انت قولته ليا
بقيت يا حبيبي خلاص أغلى غالي وقلبي اللي سابني وراح وياك
وهو أنا قلبي جنني من شوية

english.title: The feeling's origin
text: It wasn't on my mind that I stay up late at night and be tormented by my thoughts while my heart is with you
There is nothing in my imagination except what you told me
My love you already became the most precious
And my heart who left me and went with you
My heart didn't drive me crazy over nothing
You and I of all people
I already knew that life is sweeter when we are together
We are that way and till the last day
Everyday you and I live about a thousand tales
You and I were more like dreaming
Every night we slept and woke up in love and it was enough
I never take my eyes of you
The day I looked into your eyes
I saw my world in you

arabic.title: أعترف
text: وان حبي لك كبير أكبر انه ينوصف
انك النجمة البعيدة اللي جابتها الصدف
وان حبك نهر عمره ما يجف
وان حبي لك كبير أكبر انه ينوصف
انك النجمة البعيدة اللي جابتها الصدف
وان حبك نهر عمره ما يجف
وإنتي الدر الثمين اللي في قلب الصدف
وانت لي نبض الحياة اللي عمره ما وقف
يالبياض اللي سرق لون السما وباجمل احساسه نزف
وإنتي الدر الثمين اللي في قلب الصدف
وانت لي نبض الحياة اللي عمره ما وقف
يالبياض اللي سرق لون السما وباجمل احساسه نزف
انا شوقي لك كثير وشوقك اكثر اعترف
بس احبك بأول العمر وأحبك بآخره والمنتصف

english.title: I Confess
text: And that my love for you is big, bigger than to be described
That you're the far star and coincidence brought
And that you're love is a river that would never dry out
And that my love for you is big, bigger than to be described
That you're the far star and coincidence brought
And that you're love is a river that would never dry out
Oh whiteness that played on my dreams
And you're the precious pearl in the seashell
And you're my pulse of life that would never stop
And the sound of your eagerness that cried out in your absence
Oh whiteness that stole the sky's color and bleed it's sensitivity
And you're the precious pearl in the seashell
And you're my pulse of life that would never stop
And the sound of your eagerness that cried out in your absence
Oh whiteness that stole the sky's color and bleed it's sensitivity
And apologize to you, sorrow was useful for me
My eagerness to you is big and yours is bigger I confess
I love you in the beginnig of life and in it's end and in the middle

arabic.title: أعرف منين
text: واعرف منين و ازاي و امتي
و مين بايديه كان اختار يوم يقابل مين ؟
و معاه بجد ماهيش نافعة محاولة
و شايفة انا لو نسيت أولى
و لا أنا عارفة ماكنش معاه
لو فى نصيب بعدين فى حاجة
و لا أنا عارفة ماكنش معاه

english.title: and i know from where
text: and i know from where , how and when i will meet someone
and i love him from one side, and who is allowed to choose whom he will meet!
i'm trying with him, and with him i'm really vainly trying
and i'm seeing that if i forget it's better, and why i feel sad? no one can know where is the welfare!
how will i live for someone who is not living for me?
i'm neither with him, nor knowing if i will be able to be with him
and why i lose years for nothing!
what kind of love this! it was from the beginning a sufferance
what differenciates my feeling of him of loneliness's feeling
i'm seeing that the result is the same
i'm neither finding him, nor having a hope to find him
how will i live for someone who is not living for me?
i'm neither with him, nor knowing if i will be able to be with him
and why i lose years for nothing!
what kind of love this! it was from the beginning a sufferance
if the destiny wrote for me something, i will definetly see it!
i will let it come with its Circumstances, and i'm letting him, so that i will not impose myself on him

arabic.title: أنا بعشق الغنا
text: مش هلاقي زيك انت في الوجود

english.title: I adore singing
text: I adore singing before your eyes
I'm living my life for you , my soul is in you
When you are here beside me ,
and go from you to you
I love you as my life ,before my life , after my life
My love for you is above all sentiments and limits
I love you as my soul , before my soul , after my soul
I won't find someone like you in the universe ( existence)
Oh my sweetheart if I leave your arms one day I'll die
You are more than my sweetheart , all of you is my sweetheart
I wish to tell you that I'm sooooooo much in love
Let me with you , in the embrace of your heart
stay close to my hug , from my soul take me
you are my angel and the prettiest sweetheart
Oh my sweetheart if I leave your arms one day I'll die
You are more than my sweetheart , all of you is my sweetheart
I wish to tell you that I'm sooooooo much in love
I adore singing before your eyes

arabic.title: اتقى ربنا فيا
text: وخاف على واحده بتحبك محدش غيرها شال همك
ومسيرها في يوم تشيل اسمك متخسرهاش
وهى الواحدة مش بردو املها في اللى بتحبو
يشيلها في عينو طول عمرو ميجرحهاش
وخاف على واحده بتحبك محدش غيرها شال همك
ومسيرها في يوم تشيل اسمك متخسرهاش
وهى الواحدة مش بردو املها في اللى بتحبو
يشيلها في عينو طول عمرو ميجرحهاش

english.title: Fear God while Treating Me
text: I have carried you in my eyes for years3
And you are causing me so much pain4
In times of hardship you find me
living up to my principles with you5
And fear for a girl that loves you, no one but her shared your troubles
and she one day will carry your name, don't lose her
And isn't it the hope of every girl that her lover
carries her in his eyes3 for all his life and doesn't hurt her
No matter how much I complain about you
And what keeps me silent is
My loyalty and my love for you
I need to find you with me
Since the day you became my love
And fear for a girl that loves you, no one but her shared your troubles
and she one day will carry your name, don't lose her
And isn't it the hope of every girl that her lover
carries her in his eyes3 for all his life and doesn't hurt her

english.title: Fear Our God In Me
text: Fear out God in me  for taking more advantage of me
I did not understand it then but now I no longer trust you
You take off for years only reappearing in hard times coming to me with unpleasant things
But she fear for only him because she love him
Although apart she take off his sadness
And you will chase after her on the day she casted you away and yo missed her
She is the one not too cool nor too funny but she loved to be taken in his eyes for life without getting hurt
Whenever I complained of you they think that I am tired of you
But he always left me without a word
And I have been fair in loving him
I now needed nothing except for you to be by my side and you are not much by my side
Now my love you are no longer with me
While I have claime on you
But she fear for only him because she love him although apart she take off his sadness
Andy you will chase after her on the day she cast you away and you missed her
She is the one not too cool nor too funny but she loved to be taken in his eyes for life without getting hurt

english.title: Grant me the chance
text: Grant me the chance to explain to you
grant me the chance to talk with you
then after you have the choice
and teach you the secret of love.              It will help the rest and only the ones
just listen to me and decide
that is how I knew the world in you
Grant me your time for two seconds
I'll explain my feelings in two words
you are the one           I dream to be with
In the midst of all the lovers
you entered my heart in two looks
and now no one is like you
only you is in my heart
You're the scent of roses that gets me drowzee
and I lived its touch and its songs
don't say we go afar again, no,
for me my life starts with you.

arabic.title: اسالنى انا
text: وانا هاسمع لك لو الف عتاب
في ناس بتعيش في الدنيا دي
لا انا قد فراق ولا قد عذاب
في ناس بتعيش في الدنيا دي
في ناس بتعيش في الدنيا دي

english.title: Es2alni ana
text: come back to me, oh my life
i will let you blame me
i hope that you listen to me
there are people in this world who live
if you care about me.. just stay away from them
i can't handle any departure or any pain
Fee Nas Bet3eesh Fl Donia Yady
could make me feel at ease
that they take you away from me
you and i will live like strangers
Fee Nas Bet3eesh Fl Donia Yady

arabic.title: الحب الذي كان
text: ولغيرِ حُسْنكَ في الورى لا أعشقُ
بالأغصان تنمو وتُورِقُ .. بالفجر بَسّامًا يُباركُ حُبنا .. بالطير يَشدو تارةً ويُصفِقُ
فهل من عودةٍ أوَ هل وعودكَ تَصدقُ
حتى ما أبقى في متاهات الهوى
قد كان لي دومًا يضيءُ ويشرِقُ
فَهَا أنا زورقٌ في بحر حبك يَغرقُ

english.title: The love that was
text: Your love was a planet that shines
That adds to the world a fragrance that remains
That haunts me in wakefulness, in sleep
And I'm consumed in the dream of love, and I fly
You made it a habit for me to love you even in drowsiness
And for anything in the world but your beauty I have no love
And you promised me that life is beautiful
As long as you give me tenderness and pity
So the world was wet with meanings by the green vision
By leaves that grow and flourish.. by the smiling sunrise blessing our love.. by birds singing and clapping
And today you leave and abandon me
So is there a return or do your promises come true?
So that I don't remain in the labyrinths of love
I seek to connect... and the door to your touch is closed
And if I mention then I will mention the love that
was for me always shining and rising
My heart that was dark yesterday
Come back and rescue me and save me
For here I am drowning in the sea of your love

english.title: Elly Enta Matarfoosh
text: it's not known,not it appeared on me
cause i say it with my eyes
who loved you but didn't say
who told you but didn't love you
who's willing to live beside you
my dreams are the fontome of your dreams
your eyes is the country of my heart
your love is it's date of birth
every time you appear beside it
the life doesn' fit for it
oh the one that your love is sufficient
i love you sfrom the begining
i'll love you till the end
you're the one i don't forget
what do i need from this life?
your love is enough to me
i hope some day you feel

arabic.title: اللي قادرة
text: اللِي قَـادرَة عَ الــتَّحَـدِّي و عَ الــمُـواجــهَة،،
واللِي قَادرَة في خُوفهَا تِـعلِن اِحتِجَـاجـهَا،،
لَو لَــقِت أيَّامهَـا مِش مَـاشيَة بــ مَـزَاجــهَا،،
اللِي رَافضَـــة وجُـودهَا يِبقىَ سَــدّ خَــانَة،،
أو تسِـــيب حَـــدّ يعَـــامِلـها بِـــ اســتِهـانَة،،
مِـش هَــبَان مَكـسُورَة وَلا هَـــبَان يوم ضَـعِـيفَـة،،
واللِي عَـاشِـت مَـلِكَـة مِش هَـتعِيش وَصِيفَـة،،
مِش هَحَـايل قَــلب شَــايفَاه مِش عَــايِـزنِي،،
مِش هَـخَـلِّي دمُـوعِي تِـنــزِل غِـير بِــ إِذنِـي،،
مِش هَبـطَّـل ضِـحك حَـتَّى فـي عِـزّ حُـزنِي،،

english.title: The woman who can
text: The woman who can challenge and confront
The woman who can protest when she's afraid
if she felt her life is not under her control
The woman who hates being a stopgap
or letting anyone treats her badly
it's easy to revolt when she's angry
her pride prevents her from being a coward
Whether they liked it or not
as long as I have rights
I won't seem to be broken or weak
Whether they liked it or not
I think I deserve the best
And the woman who lived as a queen won't be a maidservant
I won't try with someone who doesn't want me
I won't let my tears fall without my permission
I won't live for anyone but me
I won't stop laughing even when I'm deeply sad

arabic.title: انا بنت من البنات
text: بشبهلك في العناد و في الصبر الجميل
و يفيض من ألف جيل و جيل
باب الخضوع خلاص قفلته من زمان
وكل يوم بإيدى ارفع اجمل رايات

english.title: I'm Just a Girl
text: I am like you in your stubbornness and sweet patience
I am like you in your perseverance
And [share with you] a great dream, oh my country,
a dream that will last thousands of years
And will overflow to reach generations and generations
Oh my country, who am I?
I'm just a girl like others
And I grew up to find
that you reside in my heart as a song
Your image in my eyes is sweet
I'm just a girl like others
And I was able to surpass the challenge
And finally, oh my country, I've reached that
And I've also become a minister,
I became a judge who passes verdicts
And they now honor my mother on mother's day
I have shut the doors of subjugation since long
And will keep going no matter what
And every day I will carry in my hands the most beautiful of flags

arabic.title: انا حبيتك
text: ونفسي أعيد معاك كل الي فات تاني
ولو ينفع هاخد من عمري وأديلك
يا أكتر حد أبقالي انا اتمنيته

english.title: I loved you
text: I loved you more than ever
and called you the love of my heart
and believe me , I don't believe I found you
and I wish everybody hears me
and I wish if I could live the past with you again
I found my happiness with you
I'll share my life with you
I love you and as long as I'm with you
I'll live my dreams with you
I pray to god for you at day and night
and I'll tell you just so you know
and see how far I got loving you
And if I could, I would give you years from my life
With you, I got all my dreams back
you're the one for me. the one I wished for
it seems like I prayed to god
I found my fondness with you
I'll share my life with you
I love you and when I'm with you
I'll live my dreams with you

english.title: I Am Your Love
text: I loved you love above all
But you left my life for years, and I still call you the love of my heart
And I believe what I believed, that I will never met you again
And I am saying from a part of my heart that the world will forever hear my need for you
Although life tore me from you you are still close in my heart,and all this will come to an end
Only with you my soul meet its years of happiness
I want none than you, I promise to spend my life with you
Because I love you, me and you,I always dream to live with you 2×
I used to call you day and night telling you what you have already know, and I tried to show you to come back to me, even for a chance, I am deep in my life
I am calling you, my love, my precious I want to be with you I dream of your return to me
How the long I remained in need of him
And my puzzleness crowd over me,whenever I tried to figure things out,give me a break
Only with you my soul meet its years of happiness I want none than you,I promise to spend my life with you
Because I love you me and you I always dream to live with you 2×

arabic.title: انت لغيري
text: كل بداية حلوة لأي نهاية باينة
طول ما في بيننا بعد كبير
و انت لغيري وانا مش ليك

english.title: you not my soulmate , neither i'm
text: Everything can be consider as it not coming , if it didn't came at its suitable time
Once we know the whole end for each story that we'll begin , please it mustn't be even began from its beginning
I'm not your soulmate, not you either till the end …
Whatever any reason will make us dreaming together ,  the distance between us will be like the one between earth and heaven
As long as we stayed on this way, the life will be like this
Right now, I'm trying to live after your leaving to me
As much as I'll stay out from you, please remind me to keep the distance much more far from you as much as possible
May be we'll meet someday, but after everything , the other life or maybe sometime later, very far time
After the end of all the time , in final
I'm not your soulmate, not you either till the end …
Whatever any reason will make us dreaming together ,  the distance between us will be like the one between earth and heaven
As long as we stayed on this way, the life will be like this

english.title: What's Between You and Her?
text: The glances between your eyes and hers
believe me, they are not innocent
If you want to go away, then go away!
And hurt my heart and my eyes
Not the closest one to me..
Leave her so she can console me in my pain..
I told myself time and time again
There is something strange going on between you
You are trying to hide from me
What your eyes are saying [to each other]
I won't bear becoming a topic
And that you use the tears of my heart and eyes
Because I talked so much about you
because I spoke about her so much
In whose arms can I cry?
And who can feel my pain?
If I am to accept my heartbreak,
Let it not be by her hands..

arabic.title: بتكره ليه
text: وعن نفسي ما فيش تاني رجوع تاني
وعن نفسي ما فيش تاني رجوع تاني

english.title: why do you hate
text: why do you hate that i be with you
and you say on your own mood
when there is inside of me
i say them to you and you say "it's normal"
if the feelings with you change with the time
i hope you foget me now
i don't feel you this time
you act like you're my beloved somtimes
cause i need to be by your side
you don't care about my sorrow
if the feelings with you change with the time
i hope you foget me now
i don't feel you this time
if you were satisfied then i'll be leaving
for yourself and you get fo forget me
that's it i havr the right as anybody else
to leave for myself even for once
you don't care about my sorrow
if the feelings with you change with the time
i hope you foget me now
i don't feel you this time
why do you hate that i be with you
and you say on your own mood
when there is inside of me
i say them to you and you say "it's normal"
if the feelings with you change with the time
i hope you foget me now
i don't feel you this time

arabic.title: بحبك
text: ما خلاص بقى صافي يا لبن

english.title: Your Love
text: For I said it now with the top of my voice
Don't make your heart remained a black screen
If I do not question you do not question me
I love you do don't spoil our love
And I give you my life in advance
If I do not question you do not question me
From where did you got these actions
If you cannot abandon them then alone shall you remain
I reformed you and we loved afresh
And now must you started again
Now you hurt me and I am quitting all this
And I'm saying leave me I'm a prisoner
If I don't question you don't question me
I love you so don't spoil our love
And I give you my life in advance
If I don't question you don't question me
In what did you got these actions
If you cannot abandon them then alone shall remaine

arabic.title: بداية بدايتك
text: أنا اللي جوايا ليك بدل الشوق ألف شوق
وأنا الطيبة اللي مش هتلاقي من بعديها طيبة
ولوحدي أنا اللي ليا فيك كل الحقوق
ما أنا شريكة حياتك والصاحبة وكمان الحبيبة

english.title: The beginning of your beginning
text: I am the beginning of your beginning
I am the rest of your story
I am the live that is ahead of you
and I am the live that you've missed
Who is going to take my place
and you're for who but me
I am the love of many years
my darling, you already know it
I am the first and the last
not just one of the acquaintances
Inside of me there is a thousand longing instead of one
and I am the kindness that you'll never find anywhere else
and I am the only one who has the right of you
Because I am the partner of your life, your friend and your lover
and I am the new ones
I am your speech and silence
I am the lyrics of your songs
and since I appeared in your life

english.title: MEMORIES
text: Talking about our memroies.. Why we are not missing?
Why we forgot all happens? When we heard only two words..
Past in old times.. Stories was starting like that..
While we were at beginning.. While we were in love..
Why we are not facing with that? When we met at any place..
Where is exciting to come together? But, how we belief us..
Doesn't work wishes anymore.. Who brings back lifes which away!
But, we were think all good only.. Even have big scars in hearts!

arabic.title: رايح بيا فين
text: رايح بيا فين و لفين مشاعري مودياني
وانا معاك بقيت مستغربه من كل حاجه و ليه كل حاجه معاك بقت مستغرباني
كلاام في سرك حبي ليك مش من شويه .. معرفش داا محسوبلي و لا محسوب علياا
بس اللي عارفاااه ان انا وجودي في حياتك مسأله موت او حياة بالنسبه ليا
كلاام في سرك حبي ليك مش من شويه .. معرفش داا محسوبلي و لا محسوب علياا
بس اللي عارفاااه ان انا وجودي في حياتك مسأله موت او حياه بالنسبه ليا
انا ازااي بقيت في الحاله دي اللي وصلت ليها .. جيت احكم مشاعري جيت انت واتحكمت فيها
دانا كان نفسي امسك نفسي و مقولكش حاجه .. لقيت كل حاجه داريتها بحكيلك عليهااا
كلاام في سرك حبي ليك مش من شويه .. معرفش داا محسوبلي و لا محسوب علياا
بس اللي عارفاااه ان انا وجودي في حياتك مسأله موت او حياه بالنسبه ليا

english.title: Where You Take Me
text: My feelings has reached with you to the degree of worry
When I be with you, I become wonder from everything
Why !! everything with you is make me provocative?
my love for you, didn't happen now  (it's old)
I don't know if that for me or against me !
My presence in your life is like a death or life for me
How I got to this status?
When I try to control my feelings, you came to controlled it.
I was hoping control myself and I would not say anything
But everything i was try to hide it I said about it to you (involuntarily)
my love for you, didn't happen now.  (it's old)
I don't know if that for me or against me !
My presence in your life is like a death or life for me

arabic.title: ربنا يخليك ليا
text: مش عارفه بكره من النهار ده

english.title: Rabena yekhleek leya
text: my eyes from asking too much
your eyes appear in he embrace of the sorrows
i can't separate tomorrow form today
may god keep you for me
so you love me and worry about me
you taught me how to love
and all the longing appears in my eyes
my eyes from asking too much
your eyes appear in he embrace of the sorrows
i can't separate tomorrow form today
look at me,my eyes will answer you
hug me keep me by your side
did you say you'll stay with me?
even my eye say "i love you"
may god keep you for me
so you love me and worry about me
you taught me how to love
and all the longing appears in my eyes

english.title: Ray7alak Ru7
text: my soul is going to you
oh the cure to my injuries
days are stragness if i'm not with you
i have no dreams but my dream with you
if you come back to me and call me
my biggest desire is meeting you and being with you
and my souls goes oh my beloved
my biggest desire is to find myself with you
you not be away from me even one night
i call you ,and i,day and night
am left by you in fire
my saoul is in you my precious
i melt and get perplexed for nights
my biggest desire is you calling me
oh the one that forgets me ,i never forget you
and i'm deeply in love with you my beloved
i find my life when i'm with you
i call you ,and i,day and night
am left by you in fire
my saoul is in you my precious
i melt and get perplexed for nights
my biggest desire is you calling me
oh the one that forgets me ,i never forget you
and i'm deeply in love with you my beloved
i find my life when i'm with you

arabic.title: سامحني يا حبيبي
text: سامحني يا حبيبي مش قصدي اجرحك
وياريت قلبي يطاوعني وارتاح كمان انا
سامحني يا حبيبي مش قصدي اجرحك
وياريت قلبي يطاوعني وارتاح كمان انا
خبيت عليا ليه سرك من الاول
خبيت عليا ليه سرك من الاول
انت كان لك ماضي قبلي وعرفت غيري وحبيته
والماضي ده جالي وقالي واداك حياته واديته
وعشان كده كان لازم افكر قبل ما احبك اكتر واكتر
لو حبك الماضي صحي وتلاقي روحك بين حبيبين
هيبقى فين انا مطرحي وساعتها اروح من جرحك فين
سامحني يا حبيبي مش قصدي اجرحك
بتحلف لي وبتقولي ده كان ماضي وصبح ذكرى
واعيش انا ليه مع صوره جايز تنده عليك بكره
اضمن منين الامان مع ذكرياتك زمان
والقلب عمره ما بينسى بيسيب علامه ولو همسه

اقول يا ناس افهموني ليه مقاليش وصارحني من اول المشوار
بيلوموني ويسألوني ماضي هواك ليه مخوفني وقلبي ليه محتار
اقول يا ناس افهموني ليه مقاليش وصارحني من اول المشوار
لكن انت كدبت عليا وانت اول حب ليا
حب فرحني وصبرني وغنى لي حب مش ممكن يكون في الدنيا له تاني

خطوه تالته ماشيه جنبي بتشاركني هواك

english.title: Forgive me, my love
text: forgive me, my love. It's not my intention to hurt you
when I tell you to go our separate ways and forget about our love
you're asking me why, I'll tell you and give you a peace of mind
and I wish that my heart would obey me and I get a peace of mind, too
forgive me, my love. It's not my intention to hurt you
when I tell you to go our separate ways and forget about our love
you're asking me why, I'll tell you and give you a peace of mind
and I wish that my heart would obey me and I get a peace of mind, too
why did you keep your secret from me from the beginning
and left the road for me to become longer more and more delightful
why did you keep your secret from me from the beginning
and left the road for me to become longer more and more delightful
you've had a past, and you knew and loved someone else before me
and that past 1 came to me and told me; he gave you his love and you gave him yours
and because of that, I had to think before loving you more and more
if your old love woke up and you've found yourself between two lovers
where will my place be, and how will I get away from the pain
forgive me, my love. It's not my intention to hurt you
you're swearing to me, telling me that it was a past that's become a memory
why would I live with a picture that maybe tomorrow will call for you
how could I feel safe with your memories of the past
and the heart never forgets, it'll carry a mark, even if it's a whisper
you're swearing to me, telling me that it was a past that's become a memory
why would I live with a picture that maybe tomorrow will call for you
how could I feel safe with your memories of the past
and the heart never forgets, it'll carry a mark, even if it's a whisper
you've had a past, and you knew and loved someone else before me
and that past came to me and told me; he gave you his love and you gave him yours
and because of that, I had to think before loving you more and more
you've had a past, and you knew and loved someone else before me
and that past came to me and told me; he gave you his love and you gave him yours
and because of that, I had to think before loving you more and more
if your old love woke up and you've found yourself between two lovers
where will my place be, and how will I get away from the pain
forgive me, my love. It's not my intention to hurt you
they're blaming me and asking me why am I afraid of your love and why is my heart confused
I say: people, understand me, why hasn't she told me honestly from the very beginning
but you lied to me and you're my first love
yes, I've loved you. Yes, I've loved you
a love that's made me happy, made me hold on and sang to me. A love that's one of a kind
yes, I've loved you. Yes, I've loved you
yes, I've loved you. Yes, I've loved you
but you lied to me and you're my first love
yes, I've loved you. Yes, I've loved you
a love that's made me happy, made me hold on and sang to me. A love that's one of a kind
yes, I've loved you. Yes, I've loved you
but I won't be able to go on with you
when a third step walking beside me and sharing your love with me
and because of that, I had to think before loving you more and more
but I won't be able to go on with you
when a third step walking beside me and sharing your love with me
and because of that, I had to think before loving you more and more
if your old love woke up and you've found yourself between two lovers
where will my place be, and how will I get away from the pain
if your old love woke up and you've found yourself between two lovers
where will my place be, and how will I get away from the pain
forgive me, my love. It's not my intention to hurt you

arabic.title: سكة السلامة
text: سكة السلامة شفت انا منك انت ياما
يالا بالسلامة اتفضل رد الباب وراك
احسب الغلاوة واوعي لا تتقلب عداوة
هأعيشك دراما حبيبي بلاش اعملها معاك
هو انتا محدش قالك علي قلبتي
ف العند تعالى يامعلم ودي حتتي
بأتلكك... آه بأتلكك ...ماشي ياسيدي انا ظلماك
دة ماحدش عاش تجربة الا وقوته
مش فارقه أنا أكون ف عيون الناس مستبيعة وانت ملاك
بأقسي كل مادا.. تاعبة انا نفسي وبزيادة
مش لاقية انا استفادة ... ولا حاجة ربطاني بيك
سنين انا لا حول ولا قوة
حاولت ميت محاولة ومافيش أي امل فيك
هو انتا محدش قالك علي قلبتي
ف العند تعالى يا معلم ودي حتتي
بأتلكك... آه بأتلكك ...ماشي ياسيدي انا ظلماك
دة ماحدش عاش تجربة الا وقوته
مش فارقه أنا أكون ف عيون الناس مستبيعة وانت ملاك

english.title: The Safe Road
text: [Take] the safe road [and get out of here] 1 I suffered so much by your hands
Beat it, close the door behind you
Calculate how much I adored you, be warned lest it all turns to animosity
I'll make your life a living drama
Don't tempt me because I can do it
Didn't anyone tell how I am like when I turn [hostile]?
Challenge me in stubbornness, it is my strongest suit
I'm picking a fight, yes I am, Alright then I am being unfair to
No one went through an experience and came out of it anything but stronger
And the intelligent [person] fights to death for his chance
It doesn't matter for me if people think I have nothing to lose and that you are an angel
I become more and more unsympathetic.. I am making myself too weary
I can't find any benefit [in being with you], nor anything linking me to you
I will live for myself for once
For years I have been utterly powerless
I have made a hundred attempts, there's no hope for you
Didn't anyone tell how I am like when I turn [hostile]?
Challenge me in stubbornness, it is my strongest suit
I'm picking a fight, yes I am, Alright then I am being unfair to you
No one went through an experience and came out of it anything but stronger
And the intelligent [person] fights to death for his chance
It doesn't matter for me if people think I have nothing to lose and that you are an angel

arabic.title: ضميرى بيأنبنى
text: مش حابه بالذات انت تبقى شايفنى
باصغر كده بالشكله ده ف عينيك
لا دى الواحده قوتها في فراقها كبريائها
باصغر كده بالشكله ده ف عينيك
لا دى الواحده قوتها في فراقها كبريائها

english.title: My conscience makes me feel guilty
text: My conscience makes me feel guilty because my tears betrayed me when you said that you will leave me
I don't love you to see me in my weakness that overwhelmed me
My conscience makes me feel guilty because my tears betrayed me when you said that you will leave me
I don't love you to see me in my weakness that overwhelmed me
And i don't deserve this, to be that worthless in your eyes
No, the women is strong with her pride and i won't be pathetic for you
Normally, i feel that i feel loss and all our talking has soreness
But i don't love to be like this, Darling life is like a circle*
This is tears for the good times, and it's nothing
Why would i cry and for what! for the gold that has appeard fake
And i don't deserve this, to be that worthless in your eyes
No, the women is strong with her pride and i won't be pathetic for you
And i don't deserve this, to be that worthless in your eyes
No, the women is strong with her pride and i won't be pathetic for you

arabic.title: طوبة فوق طوبة
text: لابني وابنك وعاجبني انك مشاركني بتبني معايا
مش هنمشي غير لما نرفع تاني الراية
لابني وابنك وعاجبني انك مشاركني بتبني معايا
مش هنمشي غير لما نرفع تاني الراية

english.title: Brick by brick
text: A brick on top of a brick, and build, my son
Egypt is written for my son.
For my son, and your son, and it impresses me that you participate with me and build with me.
And whatever is broken will be fixed.
You participated with me, and such a pleasing thing that is!
We won't leave until we raise, once again, the flag.
Brick by brick, and build, my son
Egypt is written for my son.
For my son, and your son, and it impresses me that you participate with me and build with me.
And whatever is broken will be fixed.
You participated with me, a pleasing thing!
We won't leave until we raise, once again, the flag.
Build so long as there is more
Build until the end of life.
Come let's chant and say along with me:
Bring with you your knowledge, and raise!
Fill those eyes of yours, fill!
And you, by your hands, you will put
your country in the sky, and you will pride over it.
That son of Egypt, who is his equal?
Who is that can dare demolish him?
Our men consume whosoever trespasses it.
Bring with you your knowledge, and raise!
Fill those eyes of yours, fill!
And you, by your hands, you will put
your country in the sky, and you will pride over it.
That son of Egypt, who is his equal?
Who is that can dare demolish him?
Our men consume whosoever trespasses it.
Build so long as there is more
Build until the end of life.
Come let's chant and say along with me:

arabic.title: غاب
text: حبيب العمر الغالي هاجر الحبيب الغالي وغاب
وسابلي أحلى ذكرى وأحلى حب وأحلى عمر وغاب
بس مين غيره مين يحس الحنين
غاب اللي كان بيحس بيا وبحكي ليه من غير حساب
قلبي بيشكيلي من بعاده سابني وحدي في العذاب

english.title: Went Absent
text: My precious beloved one for as my (whole) lifetime went absent.. He left the country1, my precious beloved & went absent
And left me the sweetest of memories, sweetest love, & sweetest lifetime & went absent
Why he went absent like that!
Left me for this confusion, it felt ache,
But who, without him, who is going to feel this nostalgia! 2
Went absent the one who felt what I felt, & whom I used to tell all I wanted without reservation
My heart complaining to me because of his absence/remoteness, left me alone in torment

arabic.title: قالوا بالكتير
text: قالوا ياما ناس عن ناس اتخلوا
وأهو ده اللي ياما انا بيأزمني

english.title: They said 'at the most'
text: They said it will be a few days at the most
after him, I will suffer for a bit
they said it's just a phase and no matter how long it might last
there's no pain that lasts forever
they said it will be a few days at most
and I will get tired of him and the state that I'm in will end
and my feelings for him will start fading out
they said 'how many times have people let go of people!'
so why my heart is burdened?
even after so many years have passed
my feelings haven't faded out nor have the died
and why my heart lived on
and for how long has it been
in this state and remained silent
years have passed without feeling them
and I'm afraid of more years to pass after them
and the few days they've told me about
not one of them has passed
what's the end to what I'm in
my feelings for him are always with me
and this is what's been bothering me
one thing is forgettable and others force me
into getting back and closer to him
what's the end to what I'm in
I've wasted what's passed from my life trying to forget about him
and what's coming I'm going to waste on forgetting about him
he's left me,, he's never left his place in my heart

arabic.title: كلمة واحدة
text: قد إيه الحلم كان كداب وخاين
قد إيه ف عينيك ماكانش الغدر باين
قد إيه ف عينيك ماكانش الغدر باين
قلبي كان من حبه يطرحلك جناين
لما غدرك كان سبب لحظة وداعنا

english.title: One Word
text: With one word that you said
everything that used to be between us ended
With one word that you said
everything that used to be between us ended
After the dream of long years
After the dream of long years,
that I lived with all my being..
Oh how lying and treacherous was the dream?
Oh how well-concealed was treachery in your eyes?
Oh how lying and treacherous is the dream?
Oh how well-concealed was treachery in your eyes?
Out of love, my heart used to plant gardens for you
And with your own hands you made the rose wilt,
Why did you sell me out?
You let us lose track of our dreams
As your betrayal was the reason of our moment of separation
And you have made me lose all the meanings in my eyes
And the story between us ended at that moment
With one word that you said
With one word that you said
everything that used to be between us ended
With one word that you said
everything that used to be between us ended
After the dream of long years
After the dream of long years,
that I lived with all my being..

arabic.title: لو كان بخاطري
text: لو كان بخاطري أنا، لو كان بكيفي كمان
ما كنت اسيبك يوم وليك عندي أغلى مكان
لو كان بخاطري أنا، لو كان بكيفي كمان
ما كنت اسيبك يوم وليك عندي أغلى مكان
لو كان بإيدي المنى ماكنت عني تغيب
لا يوم ولا سنة وأنت أعز حبيب
لسّه مكانك هنا لو فيك مالي نصيب
ولو بخاطري أنا ماكنت اسيبك يوم
لو كان بخاطري أنا، لو كان بكيفي كمان
ما كنت اسيبك يوم وليك عندي أغلى مكان
أنساك ده مش ممكن، لو راحت الأيام
أوعاك في يوم تظن الحب ده أوهام
أنساك ده مش ممكن، لو راحت الأيام
أوعاك في يوم تظن الحب ده أوهام
أحيا معاك وبيك واعيش بحبي فيك
اندهلي لو مرّه تلقاني بين ايديك
ولو بخاطري أنا، ماكنت اسيبك يوم
لو كان بخاطري أنا، لو كان بكيفي كمان
ما كنت اسيبك يوم وليك عندي أغلى مكان
وبلاش تفوتني بلاش، أنا قلبي حب وعاش
ورسم معاك طريق للعمر وأنت طناش
داري على قلبي، و احساسي الجيّاش
ولو بخاطري أنا، ماكنت اسيبك يوم
يا بسمتي وهناي بيك الوجود مليان
الدنيا انت وبس وإحساسي قلبي كمان
فادت معاك فرحي وبعدك مافيش أمان
ولو بخاطري انا ماكنت أسيبك يوم
ولو كان بخاطري صح ماكنت هسيبك

english.title: If It's In my MIND
text: If It was In my mind, If It was up to me too
I would never leave you even for a day and you hold the most precious place In my heart
You forget about me or what? Does It feel good to forget
If It was in my mind, If It was up to me too
I would never let  you go even for a day and you hold the most precious place In my heart
You forget about me or what? Does It feel good to forget
If destiney was In my hand  I wouldn't let you leave my sight
Neither a day or year you're the dearest lover
Your place Is still here If you're not meant to me
If It was In my mind, I would never let you go even for a day
If It was In my mind, If It was up to me
I would never let you go even for a day and you hold the most precious place In my heart
You forget about me or what? Does It feel good to forget
You're the existence already and the world and the dreams
It's Impossible to forget you, If the days were gone
Don't you ever think that this love es an Illusions
I live with you and through You
I live my love through you
Call me once you find In your hands
With passion and eagerness call me and I'll come to you
If It was In my mind, I would never leave you even for a day
If It was on my mind, If It was up to me too
I would never leave you even for a day and you hold the most precious place In my heart
You forget about me or what? Does It feel good to forget
Enough missing me enough,  for me heart has experienced love
And draw with you a path to life and you don't care
Take care of my heart and my overwhelming sense
If It was In my mind, I would never leave you even for a day
Oh, my smile and happiness the world es filled with you
Life es only you and the feeling of my heart too
My Joy worked with you and after you there's no safety
If It was up to me I would never leave you even for a day
If It was up to me It's true that I wouldn't let you go
leaving a scar behind and I loved your torture
And forgot happiness and the the world will come to you

arabic.title: ما فيهاش بعدين
text: قبل ما تتقال بكلام تتقال بالعين
وانا شايفاه احسا س ييجي عادي في سنين
للناس و معاه جالي في دقيقتين
قبل ما يتقاله و عرفت وانا واياه
و هتعمل ايه لو فجاة اللي بالك فيه
تجمعك الدنيا عليه و تتقابل بيه ما بتستناش
ما هي لحظة ما تتعداش ما هو على حس
اللحظة دي جايز باقي حياتك تتعاش
قبل ما يتقاله و عرفت وانا واياه

english.title: What Is In It Later
text: What's in it later had he any need in between
Before a word was said eyes already betrayed
For God's sake I have been going around sensing it
And I'm trying to reach him sensing that he might pay a visit in these years
Going round the peoples around him in very different times
Heart to heart my situation reached him
Before it was said he understand that between me and him in my life he had been living with lies
Wihat will you do if you know that your role has been uncovered to me
The world gathered you on it  and you headed towards it without knowing where you are heading
These cheats of yours are not the view and you are not very much aware of it
The view is that you could live rightly for the rest of your life
Heart to heart my situation reached him before it was said
And he understand that between me and him in my life he had been living with lies

arabic.title: ماتسبنيش
text: حاسه كأن دي أول مره حبيبي أعيش

english.title: Don't Leave Me
text: behind to live even one second
Take me to a whole new world
so that I'd live with you there
Take me away with your love
I don't want my eyes to see
safe when you are by my side
Do you know how I feel?
I feel this is the first time I'm alive
and why would I say it?
Even if I don't say anything

arabic.title: مش هنساه
text: إتواعدنا نعيش مع بعض احنا الاتنين
واديك لسه نفس الشوق في عينيك
ولا يوم ياللي أكتر ما اتمنيت
كان شاغلني حبيبي خيالك قبل لقاك

english.title: I won't forget it
text: we met for the first time and told you what
a day that I won't forget
both of us made a promise to live together
and here you are, the same longing in your eyes
the same longing and happiness to have you
no matter how long has passed from our lives
and not for one day, o' whom is more than I've wished for
I'd get tired of loving you, not for a day
was occupied with your fantasies before I met you
now will renew a promise I've made a long time ago
my whole life is with you

arabic.title: وفيها إيه
text: وتيجي زي ما تيجي حبيبي وياك
تيجي زي ما تيجي ده وأنا شايفاه
ولا سمح الله يجي يوم وأنساه

english.title: And What's Wrong With That
text: My life, from me to him (a gift)
Why do you think I'm strange?
My lifetime & all what's in it
And whatever happens2, my love, I'm with you
And all these3 days, I know you'll keep (them) safe
And for all that haven't come, & what's yet to come I'll be with you
I don't care what would befall us.. For when I see him
I find what has been missing from me
And, God forbid, I can never forget about him
A world, a life & a home
That made me forget my old fears
It wouldn't be enough for me
To live my life once for him

arabic.title: ولاد النهاردا
text: لو اتقال اني كنت رايحة منك

english.title: Today's Children
text: And I forgive you for all what have passed
To be back (with you) without any conditions
And also by a sign from you
You'll find me throwing myself into your arms
And what's making it alright for me
Is that you still need me desperately.
Come to me, I have no objection
Because I'm going back to you any way
And (even) before you call on me, I listen
And it's hard for me to go late to you
I don't even need to say "I forgive you"
If it was ever said that I was lost to you
It means I was lost for you 2
I don't need you to try & plead with me.
And no one could earn me (my affection)
Other than you, since long time
And I will make it right to both of us
All this longtime of absence I

arabic.title: يا مصرين
text: مصر شالت فوق طاقتها يرضى مين؟
امتى هنفوق كلنا من اللى احنا فيه ؟
ايه في حياتنا اهم منها نخاف عليه؟
امتى هنفوق كلنا من اللى احنا فيه ؟
ايه في حياتنا اهم منها نخاف عليه؟
مصر شالت هم أقوى من الزمان

english.title: Egyptians,
text: Egypt had overwhelming burdens. Above it's energy. Who would be okay with this?
Where is her youth? Where are her loyal children?
When will we wake up from the deep sleep we're in?
We're losing our country. What are we waiting for?
When will we wake up from the deep sleep we're in?
Save her, before it's too late.

arabic.title: ذكرياتنا
text: ذكرياتنا يا ذكرياتنا يا كل يوم مر في حياتنا
ذكرياتنا يا ذكرياتنا يا كل يوم مر في حياتنا
يوم بيحكي اللي حصل واللي هيجرى
يوم بحلوه ومره برضو احلي ذكري
يوم بيحكي اللي حصل واللي هيجرى
يوم بحلوه ومره برضو احلي ذكري
يبقا مين فرق ما بينا انهاردة
يبقا مين فرق ما بينا انهاردة
انت فاكر اول مرة عنينا اتقابلو اول مرة قلوبنا تحس
اول مرة نقول بعنينا كلام بين قلبي وقلبك بس
انت فاكر اول مرة عنينا اتقابلو اول مرة قلوبنا تحس
اول مرة نقول بعنينا كلام بين قلبي وقلبك بس
انتي فاكرة اول مرة اقولك احبك
شوفت الفرحة في ورد خدودك رعشه ايدك فرحة قلبك
انتي فاكرة اول مرة اقولك احبك
شوفت الفرحة في ورد خدودك رعشه ايدك فرحة قلبك
قولي ايه اللي حصل ايه ايه اللي جرا
واللي غيرنا كدة ايه ايه يا تري
قولي ايه اللي حصل ايه ايه اللي جرا
واللي غيرنا كدة ايه ايه يا تري
ليه بننسى الحب في لحظه غضب
ليه نبيع بالرخص ايام من دهب
ليه بننسى الحب في لحظه غضب
ليه نبيع بالرخص ايام من دهب
ليه تملي نقول دي قسمة ونصيب انكتب
ليه تملي نقول دي قسمة ونصيب انكتب
‏(أ​م) عايز تقول انك فاكرني (ه​﻿ ​ش) هو مين قالك نسيتك
‏(أ​م) يعني قلبك مش بايعني (ه​﻿ ​ش) بعت عندي واشتريتك
‏(أ​م) عايز تقول انك فاكرني (ه​﻿ ​ش) هو مين قالك نسيتك
‏(أ​م) يعني قلبك مش بايعني (ه​﻿ ​ش) بعت عندي واشتريتك
لو شكا في يوم قلبي منك قوله اصبر
قوله حبة في قلبك يوم عن يوم بيكبر
لو شكا في يوم قلبي منك قوليله اصبر
قوليله حبة في قلبك يوم عن يوم بيكبر
لو هقولك مره تانية اني هحبط ابقي قول للقلب وحياتك ما تهبط
لو هقولك مره تانية اني هحبط ابقي قول للقلب وحياتك ما تهبط

english.title: Our memories
text: Our memories, oh, our memories, oh, every day of our lives
Our memories, oh, our memories, oh, every day of our lives
A day that tells what's happened and what's going to happen
A day of sweetness and bitterness, I remember
A day that tells what's happened and what's going to happen
A day of sweetness and bitterness, I remember
My memories and your memories are one
So, what is the difference between us today?
My memories and your memories are one
So, what is the difference between us today?
You remember the first time we met, the first time you were moved by passion
The first time we only spoke words between my heart and your heart
You remember the first time we met, the first time you were moved by passion
The first time we only spoke words between my heart and your heart
You reemeber the first time I said I love you
You showed joy in the roses of your cheeks, the quiver of your hands, the joy of your heart/soul
And today it was like both Eids together
You reemeber the first time I said I love you
You showed joy in the roses of your cheeks, the quiver of your hands, the joy of your heart/soul
And today it was like both Eids together
Today it was like both Eids together
Tell me, what happened, what happened?
And what changed us, what, what do you see?
Tell me, what happened, what happened?
And what changed us, what, what do you see?
Why did I forget the love in a moment of passion?
Why did we give up all that we had?
Why did I forget the love in a moment of passion?
Why did we give up all that we had?
Why do you tell me this is fate that is meant to be?
Why do you tell me this is fate that is meant to be?
(AM) You're saying that you remember me? (HS) Who told you that I forgot you?
(AM) You mean your heart is not affected? (HS) I sold it and bought you!
(AM) You're saying that you remember me? (HS) Who told you that I forgot you?
(AM) You mean your heart is not affected? (HS) I sold it and bought you!
If it complained, then tell it to be patient
It was saying a love was growing day by day
If it complained, then tell it to be patient
It was saying a love was growing day by day
If I tell you that I'm falling (for you), keep telling your heart and you will fall (for me) too
If I tell you that I'm falling (for you), keep telling your heart and you will fall (for me) too
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Welcome, my love, to my heart
Welcome to the security I vow to you
Our memories, our memories, our memories

arabic.title: عيشها
text: يا عالم ايه هيجرالنا، اذا هم السنين طالنا
يا ريت ننسى همومنا ونرضى بالأيام
ساعات الفرحة بتحلي في طعم المر
نعيش من غير زعل ولا كره ولا تلاكيك
ومهما الشر طال ليله، ابعد عنه وغنيله

english.title: Live It
text: Oh people, what would happen to us if the sadness of years caught up to us?
We would become weary and live the days giving up
We would be sad wherever we go
Why would we occupy ourselves with our wounds?
It would be great to forget our sadness and content ourselves with the days
Live life just as it is
It is not worth being afraid of
It will love us and we love it
Let us live it, in sadness or in joy
Sometimes happiness sweetens the taste of bitterness
And makes our hearts pure and always
we live without sadness, hate or excuses
And no matter how long evil's night went on, Stay away from it1
Life is a mirror, show her and she will show you
Live life just as it is
It is not worth being afraid of
It will love us and we love it
Let us live it, in sadness or in joy

arabic.title: لشو نزعل
text: لشو نزعل لشو نعتب لشو الهموم
لشو نبكي الدني رحلة وما راح بتدوم
لشو نحزن على امبارح، إذا كان العمر رايح
تعو نفرح تعو نسامح تعو نمحي أثر الغيوم
لشو نزعل لشو نعتب لشو الهموم
لشو نبكي الدني رحلة وما راح بتدوم
دني حلوة بلا قسوة القسى ما منيح
اذا ما جرحنا وقسينا، ما راح يبقى الحزن فينا
تعو نضحك تعو نغني تعو نمحي أثر الهموم
لشو نزعل لشو نعتب لشو الهموم
لشو نبكي الدني رحلة وما راح بتدوم
لشو نحزن على امبارح، إذا كان العمر رايح
تعو نفرح تعو نسامح تعو نمحي أثر الغيوم

english.title: Why be sad
text: Why be sad, why blame, why have worries?
why cry, life is a trip and it will not last
why be sad for yesterday, given that age passes
come lets be happy, come lets forgive, come lets erase the trace of clouds
Why be sad, why blame, why have worries?
why cry, life is a trip and it will not last
beautiful life without cruelty, cruelty is not good
If we did not hurt or be cruel, sadness will not stay in us
come lets laugh, come lets sing, come lets erase the trace of worries
Why be sad, why blame, why have worries?
why cry, life is a trip and it will not last
why be sad for yesterday, given that age passes
come lets be happy, come lets forgive, come lets erase the trace of clouds

arabic.title: اهو ده اللى صار
text: و خير بلادنا مهوش في ايدنا
و بدال ما يشمت فينا حاسد
و بدال ما يشمت فينا حاسد

english.title: This is What Happened
text: And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
How can you blame me, oh our master
when the riches of our country are not even in our hands?
How can you blame me, oh our master
when the riches of our country are not even in our hands?
Speak of things that would benefit us
and then come back to blaming me
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
Take good care of [your] beloved ones
They are the supports of the cause
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
And instead of allowing an envious hater to be happy at our expense,
and get up and let's fight
And instead of allowing an envious hater to be happy at our expense,
and get up and let's fight
then we would all become one hand
And the hands would become strong
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was
You have no right to blame me
And so this is what happened
and this is how it was; You have no right
You have no right to blame me
